blocks.text: For every feature, the value varies between 0 - 255, we set the value of every feature == 1 if it is greater than 0(i.e converted all gray scale images to black and white).Then we Train with svm using the following parameters C=200, kernel ='rbf', gamma = 0.01, cache_size = 8000,probability = False
Drawback was that SVM took very long time to train and couldn't be implemented on jupyter notebook, had to be implemented on script
B. Used decision tree classifier and logistic regression
Drawback was that both of these could'nt give satisfactory results

First converted target feature to categorical using  to_categorical function. Then implemented the Neural Network with [784,512,10] layers, used [sigmoid,softmax] activation function. Trained the model with batch size of 128 and number of epochs = 10. Used sgd optimizer and loss
